analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#114-116:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Slotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#116-117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMinBetAmount (/unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#206) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#212) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_pointer' of Slotthereum.setPointer (/unique_chucks/14/0xb43b5be03416ca16f7b9749c6aba818538dcc032.sol#219) is not in mixedCase
